name: OK Hand
baseMeaning: A hand making the OK sign with thumb and index finger forming a circle.
tldr: Usually means 'perfect' or 'okay'. Can also mean 'chef's kiss' for something excellent.

contextMeanings.meaning: Indicating agreement or that something is okay.
Chef's kiss - something is just right.

platformNotes.note: Common for acknowledging messages or tasks.

warnings.title: Cultural context
warnings.description: In some contexts, this gesture has been co-opted. Generally safe when clearly meaning 'OK' or 'perfect'.
